definitions.text: accumulated wealth in the form of money or jewels etc.
examples: the pirates hid their treasure on a small island in the West Indies

definitions.text: art highly prized for its beauty or perfection
any possession that is highly valued by its owner
examples: the children returned from the seashore with their shells and other treasures
the trunk held all her meager treasures

definitions.text: be fond of; be attached to
